select b.id, b.title, b.description, b.cover, b.up, b.down, b.star, b.views, b.create_time
, if((select count(up.id) from up where up.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_up, if((select count(down.id) from down where down.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_down, if((select count(star.id) from star where star.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_star
from blog b where (b.title like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') or b.description like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') or b.content like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%')) group by b.id, b.title, b.description, b.cover, b.up, b.down, b.star, b.views, b.create_time
